newsitem.title: USA: Duff & Phelps reaffirms RJR Nabisco ratings.
newsitem.headline: Duff & Phelps reaffirms RJR Nabisco ratings.

text.p: Duff & Phelps Credit Rating Co said Friday it reaffirmed RJR Nabisco Inc's Triple B Minus senior unsecured debt rating and D Three commercial paper rating.

Duff & Phelps also reaffirmed its rating on RJR Nabisco Holdings Corp's preferred stock and preferred equity redemption cumulative stock and RJR Nabisco Holdings Capital Trust I's trust originated preferred sec NEW YORK, Feb 28 (Reuter) - Duff & Phelps Credit Rating Co said Friday it reaffirmed RJR Nabisco Inc's Triple B Minus senior unsecured debt rating and D Three commercial paper rating. The action follows the cigarette and food company's announcement it will increase the common dividend rate by about 11 percent and repurchase up to $200 million of common stock during 1997. Duff & Phelps also reaffirmed its rating on RJR Nabisco Holdings Corp's preferred stock and preferred equity redemption cumulative stock and RJR Nabisco Holdings Capital Trust I's trust originated preferred securities. A total of about $8 billion in securities are affected by the action. RJR Nabisco Inc has an 80.5 percent ownership interest in RJR Nabisco Holdings Corp valued at more than $8 billion, Duff & Phelps said. On Wednesday, investor Carl Icahn disclosed in a filing that he sold his 7.3 percent, 20-million share stake in RJR Nabisco Holdings. ((Chicago newsdesk 312 408-8787))
